Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.strings.conversion

Interface AsString

All Known Subinterfaces:
AsIndentedString, Message
All Known Implementing Classes:
Activity, Alert, Announcement, ArgumentList, BaseList, BaseSet, BitCount, Bytes, CommandLine, Count, CriticalAlert, DigestPassword, Duration, EnsureFailure, Estimate, FatalProblem, FileList, FtpNetworkLocation, Glitch, Host, HttpNetworkLocation, Information, LocalHost, Loopback, Maximum, MessageList, Minimum, Narration, NetworkLocation, ObjectList, ObjectSet, OperationFailed, OperationHalted, OperationLifecycleMessage, OperationMessage, OperationStarted, OperationStatusMessage, OperationSucceeded, PlainTextPassword, Problem, Quibble, SecureFtpNetworkLocation, SecureHttpNetworkLocation, Stack, StepFailure, StepIncomplete, StepSuccess, StringList, SwitchList, Trace, Unsupported, ValidationIssues, Warning
public interface AsString
Interface to an object that can produce one or more different kinds of string representations. This can be useful when the Object.toString() method is already being used or when other kinds of strings are needed for specific purposes.

The StringFormat enum defines different kinds of string representations which can be retrieved with asString(StringFormat). The object can override this method to provide multiple string representations for specific purposes. The object must override asString() to provide a default representation for any purpose.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
